name: Rings of Zon
overview: This action puzzle game from George Broussard was akin to a more intellectual Boulderdash where you must travel many trapped and tricky caverns to find the three ancient Rings of Zon to help defeat Korak, the Dark Lord and practitioner of the black arts. While you are just a sorcerer's apprentice, you are chosen by the Council of Magicians to take up this difficult task.
